# mapItemDetail(_:)

**Type Method**

Detailed information about a place

## Declaration

```swift
class func mapItemDetail(_ presentationStyle: MKSelectionAccessory.MapItemDetailPresentationStyle) -> MKSelectionAccessory
```

## Parameters

- **presentationStyle**: The presentation style to use

## Discussion

Supported for [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapFeatureAnnotation] and [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKMapItemAnnotation].
